info.title: API protocol for working with HEROSMS
info.description:
Do you use software for registrations? HeroSMS is compatible with former SMS-Activate partners

1. Choose any software that includes SMS-Activate among its SMS reception services.
2. Select SMS-Activate as the service for receiving SMS.
3. Replace the host from https://api.sms-activate.ae to https://hero-sms.com in your software settings.
4. Enter the API key from your HeroSMS account (request it on our website).

If you face any difficulties, contact our tech support, please. We will deal with everything.

get.description: Returns the current balance in the format `ACCESS_BALANCE:<amount>`
Requests a phone number for the specified service and country. Returns a string like `ACCESS_NUMBER:<activation_id>:<number>`
Similar to getNumber, but returns more activation information (JSON object)

Activation lifecycle management.
Possible statuses:
- 1 — SMS sent (inform about readiness to receive code)
- 3 — request resending of SMS
- 6 — complete activation (code received and confirmed)
- 8 — cancel activation (return money)
Returns the current activation status in text form (STATUS_WAIT_CODE, STATUS_OK, etc.) + code if available
Returns the activation status in a structured form (JSON)

get.summary: Get a list of active activations

Result of request for list of services
Result of request for a list of operators

get.description: Returns prices and quantity of available numbers by country and service
Returns the top countries by service with the number of available numbers. If the service is not specified - top for all services

200.description: The result of obtaining the top countries by service

200.description: The result of obtaining the top countries by service

get.summary: Get current prices and rental quantities
get.description: Returns prices and quantity of available numbers for the selected service for rental

200.description: Result of getting current prices and rental quantities

get.description: Requests a phone number for the specified service and country for a given period.

value.title: NEW_OTP_RECEIVED

tags.name: Webhooks
tags.description:
##### Real-time event notification mechanism.
After a purchase of the number, there is no need to repeatedly request activation status to receive incoming SMS messages.
The service sends SMS content to the specified HTTPS URLs using the POST method.

Up to 3 webhook URLs can be supported simultaneously.
URLs are specified in the accounts personal information.
Each webhook call is performed independently for each specified URL.
- Method: POST
- Content-Type: application/json
- Response timeout: 3 seconds
- If there is no response with code 200, the call is considered unsuccessful:
    - Number of retries - 7 times at least
    - Delay between retries - 20–30 seconds
    - Total duration of attempts - 3 minutes at least

It is strongly recommended to respond with a 200 code even if the SMS has already been processed on the recipient's side.

##### Source IP addresses of webhook requests
To ensure correct performance, add the following IP addresses to the whitelist:
- ```84.32.223.53```
- ```185.138.88.87```

post.description: The event is sent upon reception of an incoming SMS to the number linked to the active activation

requestBody.description: JSON with a data about the received SMS

default.description: Webhook is not accepted, up to 7 retries
